N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.13 - Food storage

State Regulations
(a) Storerooms and pantries. Storerooms and pantries shall be dry, well lighted and
ventilated. All proper measures shall be taken to keep them free from vermin
and rodents. (b) Refrigeration of perishable foods. In the refrigeration of all perishable foods, the
temperature shall be at or below 45 degrees Fahrenheit. (c) Freezers. Freezers and frozen food compartments shall be maintained
at minus 10 to 0 degrees Fahrenheit. (d) Thermometers. Thermometers shall be attached to all refrigerated areas
in the warmest zones. Notes
